channel.title: beanstalkd on Alfred Nutile
channel.description: Recent content in beanstalkd on Alfred Nutile

item.title: Laravel Homestead and Beanstalkd Console
item.description: I am doing some queue work and wanted beanstalkd console installed so I can see the status of the queue Using Laravel Homestead as the vagrant box http://laravel.com/docs/homestead I needed to Download beanstalkd console https://github.com/ptrofimov/beanstalk_console Setup Homesteads yml file Provision the box Setup my local hosts file to a url Finally run php artisan queue:listen to have my app call to the queue. And that was about it.
